title: Vs Ai Intermediate
body:
The most annoying problem for me right now. After some matches, I do AI for fun and test. Then I met those ppl? They picked normally, then in game, just go and feed all the bots. I'm pretty sure they are some kind of programs cause they don't talk, doing everything like a bot (worse than LOL bots) . There are no response from them (/ff and only 1 vote). Their lvl are like 8-12 but always the same summoner, no history, no normal matches.
So I just want to ask is this a new third party to help lvling or they are real people? Cause it made me mad when I met 4 of them in a game. My relaxing game became hell. I already met 5 of these KIA players, reported all but no use. {{item:3070}}

replies.body: They are bot scripts. Basically the bot plays for them on their account.

Honestly its not that hard to defeat the AI because lol bots are very very  stupid and they will normally group up in a lane with a turret down. Just backdoor the bots. Other than that play a champion that you are confident you can win a 1v5 with.

> So I just want to ask is this a new third party to help lvling or they are real people?

They are bots 100%. They'll level the accounts and then sell them, they go for around US$10. It's a bit of a black market, most of the buyers are trolls, who want to ruin games in ranked on a smurf or want a replacement account for their banned one.

Nah, look at my picture. Yami KIA, then Eddy KIA or something. They are XXX KIA XXX.
But sorry for making your misunderstanding
there's no misunderstanding im just poking some fun at there names
